Name: Godland : The Fire Quest 2
About the game: Ruban Gusandar and his people flee the flames of war destroying everything he knew... It is in the flames of anger, of determination that Ruban finds the strength to raise his head. This fury that allows him to avoid losing all hope, his rage that nourishes him even more than tenacity... But the reality is in his total disadvantage... The empire of Drasko threatens to annihilate the Kingdom of Yholm land of the elves. Will Ruban be able to change the situation? What is Drasko trying to accomplish? How will the countries of the world react? Discover the next part of Ruban's adventure and search for the best way to save your people against an enemy infinitely more powerful than you. Peace on the island is now nothing more than ancient history, you will have to fight and struggle to move forward! Features: multiples choices and endings Unique graphic style
